body:
Just a quick help thread for the community! These are heads created by Mojang for players use. These are good to have when map making or creating various things in minecraft. The command to obtain these heads is (Don't include the > when typing in this command) : </give username 397 1 3 {SkullOwner:"Username"}>
Here they are! (I'll add more if I find some :)
- Mobs
  • MHF_Alex
  • MHF_Blaze
  • MHF_CaveSpider
  • MHF_Chicken
  • MHF_Cow
  • MHF_Enderman
  • MHF_Ghast
  • MHF_Golem
  • MHF_Herobrine
  • MHF_LavaSlime
  • MHF_MushroomCow
  • MHF_Ocelot
  • MHF_Pig
  • MHF_PigZombie
  • MHF_Sheep
  • MHF_Slime
  • MHF_Spider
  • MHF_Squid
  • MHF_Villager
- Blocks
  • MHF_Cactus
  • MHF_Chest
  • MHF_Melon
  • MHF_OakLog
  • MHF_Pumpkin
  • MHF_TNT (For you Zintenka! :3)
  • MHF_TNT2
- Miscellaneuos
  • MHF_ArrowUp
  • MHF_ArrowDown
  • MHF_ArrowLeft
  • MHF_ArrowRight
  • MHF_Exclamation
  • MHF_Question

    - Comment heads
    benbick = Rubik's Cube
    AutoSoup = Redstone Lamp
    BowAimbot = Bookshelf
    C418 = Jukebox
    scraftbrothers2 = Smiling Snowman
    MHF_Apple = Apple
    MHF_Cake = Cake
    MHF_TNT:Primed


    It'd be awesome if you could give me the names of ones I missed so I can add them!
